name: philological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the study of language, especially its history and development: The book was the outcome of his philological work. In autumn 1889 he enrolled in philological studies at Leipzig University. See
philology
More examplesFewer examplesHis philological work focused on the lexis, pronunciation, and orthography of English.High school had provided him with excellent philological skills.Most of what we know is based on traditional philological research, with literary texts as data.
